categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles Mini Movies

nodes.text: Who Let The Clones Out is a two-minute LEGO Mini Movie that is connected to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles animated TV series. It is the second video and was released on YouTube on March 22, 2013.

After escaping Jedi Master Yoda, Count Dooku and General Grievous have traveled to Kamino to start experimenting with creating a Sith clone army. Dooku approaches a pair of Clone troopers guarding a cloning chamber and use the Force to knock members unconscious. Meanwhile at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, Yoda senses a disturbance in the Force while teaching the Padawans how to handle a rancor.

Back at Kamino, Dooku tries to clone General Grievous using the secret information supplied by Jabba. At that point, Darth Sidious contacts the Separatist leaders to inquire about the progress of his Sith clone army. Dooku claims they are making progress. However, their first cloning experiment produces a triple-headed giant version of Grievous which proceeds on a "search and destroy" mission against the two Separatists. Dooku manages to destroy the monster by sending him to fetch a metal object in the seas of Kamino.

However, Dooku and Grievous are then attacked on the landing platform by several Clone troopers. Dooku uses the Force to rebuild his wrecked starship as a modified stealth starfighter. In space, a disappointed Darth Sidious tells Dooku that his new Sith clone army must be ready to serve the Dark side of the Force.
